content: of yarn into three groups according to colour and braid/plait to desired length fasten with overhand knot and trim to neaten repeat for second earflap ensuring that tassels are an equal length pattern toddler approximately 6-18 months round 1 with orange yarn magic_ring chain 2 counts as double_crochet 11 double_crochet in magic_ring slip_stitch to chain 2 12 sts round 2 chain 2 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in same st 2 double_crochet in each st around slip_stitch to chain 2 24 sts round 3 chain 2 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in same st and next st *2 double_crochet double_crochet* cont increase around slip_stitch to chain 2 36 sts round 4 chain 2 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in same st and next 2 sts *2 double_crochet double_crochet in next 2 sts* cont increase around slip_stitch to chain 2 48 sts round 5 chain 2 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in same st and next 3 sts *2 double_crochet double_crochet in next 3 sts* cont increase around slip_stitch to chain 2 60 sts rounds 6-12 chain 2 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in same st and next 58 sts slip_stitch to chain 2 60 sts round 13 chain 2 counts as half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in same st and next 58 sts slip_stitch to chain 2 60 sts round 14 attach green yarn with slip_stitch chain 1 counts as single_crochet single_crochet in same st and next 58 sts slip_stitch to chain 1 do not tie off cont with first earflap 60 sts first earflap row 1 chain 1 single_crochet in same st and next 11 sts chain 1 turn 12 sts row 2 decrease single_crochet in next 8 sts decrease chain 1 turn 10 sts row 3 single_crochet in each st chain 1 turn 10 sts row 4 decrease single_crochet in next 6 sts decrease chain 1 turn 8 sts row 5 single_crochet in each st chain 1 turn 8 sts row 6 decrease single_crochet in next 4 sts decrease chain 1 turn 6 sts row 7 single_crochet in each st chain 1 turn 6 sts row 8 decrease single_crochet in next 2 sts decrease chain 1 turn 4 sts 4 row 9 decrease decrease chain 1 turn 2 sts row 10 decrease tie off second earflap row 1 leaving 22 sts bet first and second earflaps along front of beanie attach green yarn with slip_stitch chain 1 single_crochet in same st and next 11 sts chain 1 turn 12 sts row 2-9 cont as for first earflap row 10 decrease chain 1 counts as single_crochet turn 2 single_crochet in middle of decrease single_crochet around for edging 3 single_crochet in middle of decrease at base of second earflap slip_stitch to chain 1 tie off and weave in all ends spikes make 5 work continuously do not join after each round round 1 with yellow yarn magic_ring chain 1 counts as single_crochet 5 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 sts round 2 *2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 sts* repeat 8 sts round 3 *2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 3
